Reviews.Title: Camera case does not fit
Reviews.Author: William D Riley
Reviews.Content: The camera appears to be just what we wanted, however, the camera case that was supplied with the camera does not fit the camera.  It is too small and there is no way the camera will fit into this case.  I have called Focus camera twice and emailed their customer service department, but no one has gotten back to me.

Reviews.Title: Lots of features for the price, some gotchas
Reviews.Author: Joanna Daneman
Reviews.Content: Lot of features in this camera especially for someone who wants a camera to do almost everything. The Canon SX510 has a lens that goes from wide angle to telephoto, a stabilization system to let you take sharp photos, and it processes lightning-fast. It is actually a very good camera and for the price. I gave it a try (needed a backup, lightweight camera) but it turns out it is missing a few features I've come to rely on. If you don't need these extras, you'll love it, because it's an excellent camera with a lot of function and quality. You'd have to pay quite a bit more to get the extra features I happen to like, so if you don't need them, this is quite the deal for a highly-functional digital camera.Good points:1. 12 megapixel resolution2. ISO up to 3200 (possible to shoot at ISO 6400 under special low-light setting)3. 24-720 mm Optial Zoom (one lens from wide angle to telephoto with no changing required.)4. Min shutter speed 15 sec to a maximum of 1/1600 sec5. Does video (MP4) w 240 frames per sec at low res, and has hi res available6. WiFi built in (can do GPS sharing to your mobile phone, etc)7. Lightweight, small size. Controls are knob plus the direction dial (familar to Canon users)8. Manual setting available (with some limitations)9. The IS (Intelligent Stabilization) can let you shoot with a steadier hand at low shutter speeds (great if you tend to shake--I'm not steady anymore below 1/125 sec--when I was a kid, I could handhold 1/60th reliably but not anymore.)Bad Points1. No viewfinder and NO flip screen (flat on back) No touchscreen. This was the killer for me--angled flipscreens are dead useful in bright light and when doing video. Once you get used to having one, it's difficult to go without.2. Hard to see the screen due to glare in bright light.3. No flip up flash: this is another issue. You have to be reminded to flip UP the flash if you need flash. It doesn't automatically flip up when the exposure is calling for flash.4. There is a low-light mode (ISO 6400) but you can't set it manually and it works by reducing resolution.5. No raw shooting modeSummary:The steady-Eddie IS system AND the wide range of focal length in the lens make this a one-camera-does-all for most people and if you can live with the screen limitation, this camera gives the user a great deal of function for a moderate price. You can hardly get this much camera if you were to upgrade to a DSLR like a T4i or SL1 without spending at least twice as much, so the flash and the fixed screen and some limitation of low-light shooting may well make this a great do-everything camera for a very reasonable price. The Canon SL1 would be a good alternative to get around the limitations: more resolution, touch screen, optical viewfinder but again, it costs quite a bit more.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with camera
Reviews.Author: Doris Browning
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, however, the case that came with it is too small.  It won't fit in there. I had to order a different case.

Reviews.Title: Bought for myself.
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: The reason i only gave it 4 stars was due to the fact that i did not receive the 32GB memory card with it. Went online and printed out in depth directions. Easy to read and understand.

Reviews.Title: Excelent camera!
Reviews.Author: Pedro Henrique Carvalho de Castro
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!! The bundle is worth the price and all the itens look exactly like the picture, I strongly recommend it. I wish the camera bag was a little bit bigger though.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX510 HS---After a Weeks Use
Reviews.Author: Raymond Laws
Reviews.Content: I mistakenly ordered the Canon 510, instead of the Canon 50.  I do like the 510, and have been able to take some very good pictures with it.  However, there are two cons that I have discovered so far.  The first is that it does not have an small view finder---only the large screen, which make the camera almost unusable in bright sunlight.  The other con:  Canon has saw fit NOT to provide a user's manual with the camera.  So, you must go on line to get one---over half of it pertains to connecting the camera to WIFI.  Cameras are bought to take pictures; therefore, with a camera so small and complicated as the 510, explicit instructions are needed to explain and tell the user about the camera's many features.  I'm finding every time I use the camera that something is hidden deep within the software that astounds me.  We need to be told, in written form, how to get to these features and how to use them.In order to use the full optical zoom, a good tripod is required.  The image stabilizer is simply not good enough to handle the shake which occurs when trying to use the zoom.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: Donna L. Balogh
Reviews.Content: Great quality and easy to use. This is a first camera for my son who wants to take professional pictures one day. He absolutely loves it!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Adealio1
Reviews.Content: Camera is very good point and shoot.  Very good for casual photography. One thing I was disappointed in is the case that was included in package.  It would not fit this camera at all let alone a smaller digital camera.  Only downside.  Rest of package is stuff that will be regularly used.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely OUTSTANDING Camera
Reviews.Author: apaladin
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my wife and is absolutely LOVES the camera.  Delivery was lighting fast and the camera is easy to use and perfectly designed for a novice photographer.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the camera
Reviews.Author: samyak manandhar
Reviews.Content: This was my gift to my wife for our wedding anniversary. We took it to our vacation to Puerto Rico. I checked it in stores and in the canon website as well, and I found that the bundle offered in Amazon was the least expensive. It reached in 2 days as I am prime account holder.Let me begin with the camera case. It is nice and easy to carry. Unlike mentioned in previous reviews, the camera and other stuffs fitted well into the case.Camera is awesome.  Very good pics, high quality. However the pictures in darker places did not come as good as I expected. But I am just starting to use camera and still am learning the settings according to places and light condition. I used manual mode and setting the aperture most of the time . In dark places, the shutter time would be too long(5-6 secs), so by the time it took a picture the subject would already have moved. But again as I said I don't know if I was supposed to use other settings than manual.Video quality too is very good. Camera is very light, so is easy to be carried.The bundle came with canon battery and an extra battery which is not canon.The tripod is small, around 20 cm in length. It was useful to take picture of me with my wife, as we did not feel comfortable to ask passerby to take pics of us together.Overall I am very satisfied with the camera. My wife is very happy with her gift and her beautiful pictures in Puerto Rico.

Reviews.Title: Good job!!
Reviews.Author: jeff donald
Reviews.Content: The case was to small I was mad!!! But 3 days later a bigger case came in the mail.  Thanks I love it!

Reviews.Title: Accessory Pack
Reviews.Author: chrisygirl
Reviews.Content: The liquid lense cleaner leaked- more than half the bottle emptied. Luckily the camera was not damaged.Only the other items in the plastic bag got soaked.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Sharon L. "Sharon"
Reviews.Content: Used it on a road trip up the Pacific Coast Highway. I was able to get great  close up shots of the Elephant Sealsas well as interior family pix. This camera performs best in low light situations. I had to fiddle around manually in bright sunlight.It is light weight, easy to use and has a moderate battery life. The battery charger is unique to the camera so don't forget to bring it along, as I did :(That said, I would definitely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: christopher ransom
Reviews.Content: I like the camera overall the only reason it doesn't get five stars is that it came with only a 16gb card when it clearly stays comes with a 32gb card, other than that very pleased

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Shawper
Reviews.Content: I am amazed at the sharpness and quality of the pictures I've taken, especially when I've maxed out on the zoom! I was concerned when I read about other reviews where people said it wouldn't focus, but I've had cameras like this before where you "soft touch" the shutter button to focus before pushing it in all the way to take the picture and I've gotten perfect pictures every time. I'm pleased with the battery life and have yet to have run out of power during the day though I've purchased a spare battery so swap it out and fresh charge after each day of use so I don't know how much more than a day's use I could get without draining the battery. Great deal on the kit!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: John P.
Reviews.Content: I have found nothing I dislike about this camera.It's light weight and easy to use.This complete package with extra battery, much larger memory card and other  accessories was only $29.00 more than a reconditioned SX 510 HS on the Canon website.I have had it about 3 weeks and have taken about 50 pics.All of them are great.The only accessory I found it necessary to purchase was a Mega Gear, Ultra light, neoprene camera case as I hike and ride an ATV in the Sierra's quit a bit and my camera is always hanging from my neck.I needed to protect it from the dust and yet have it ready for a fast pic.I had  12 year old electronic camera and decided it was time to get a lighter camera.I looked ay several camera's and the SX510 was the best buy for my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mike Baron
Reviews.Content: I talked to a professional photographer about my chose,  and he said I would love it.  All I have to say is What a great camera!

Reviews.Title: ok camera
Reviews.Author: jencat
Reviews.Content: I think this camera is ok. I think my powershots were just as good. Sometimes the flash is too much and it whites out peoples faces. Overall its pretty quick!

Reviews.Title: Lightweight/Good Bargain
Reviews.Author: Bernice D. Crouse "Public Library Director"
Reviews.Content: I have been using a digital Canon EOS Rebel, since it was first released.  Still love it, but a recent back problem made me consider lightening my camera load especially for travel.  This certainly does that, while providing more zoom, and great photos.  The kit is all inclusive, too.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Firefighter13bg
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife. It has been easy to use and takes great pictures. Love the wifi feature! Recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Prokaka
Reviews.Content: So good. I love canon camera. I and my familly always use cannon for taking pic. Moreover, this is the best price for a whole package.

Reviews.Title: NICE CASE.
Reviews.Author: C. W. Mcarthur "I do this for a living"
Reviews.Content: Dunno what people are talking about.  If you open the case it DOES appear that the camera won't fit.  But I suspect that these folks didn't realize that the center soft wall is attached via velcro and is easily removed and repositioned.I don't think I'll use the case all that often, but the other goodies make it all good.  If anything the case will hold all the other loot and make transport all the better.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Adriana caetano
Reviews.Content: I Like it, its good but i expected more. The resolution is less than i expected, but i van take a good pictures.

Reviews.Title: This is a great starter camera.
Reviews.Author: Dee Lilly
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital.  There's a lot to learn, But I can point and click or play with manual mode. I'm 64 and I'm finding everything simple and I love the pictures.  I do find the action pictures of the Grandsons and baseball somewhat blurry, but I figure its me.  Everything arrived in good condition except for the lens cleaner.  It leaked on some of the accessories.  But amazon made up for it and more.  I will buy from this store again.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Maria Bradley
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a small compact camera that I could take to my trip to Italy that would be easy to tote around and take great pictures. I found it in the Canon Powershot SX510. This camera is not only small enough to fit in messenger bag but it takes great pictures too! I absolutely love the 30x zoom feature that gets you up close to images that are too far to appreciate. The only negative I would say is that the flash does not pop up automatically when needed. It has to be opened manually. Other than that, I love this little camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the wanna be's like me!
Reviews.Author: Lauri "I love to be totally immersed in a goo...
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera set after a friend of mine had the same one in Mexico with us.  She took some fabulous pic's of the whales etc.  So... I bought the same one thinking she had done the research so why double it.  It has been a great camera for me.  It is simple and intuitive and takes wonderful photos.  The zoom on it is powerful without being bulky.  I didn't care for the case so made me a less bulky one and it has been wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera!!!
Reviews.Author: vale
Reviews.Content: Easy to use it! I love it! Similar as a profesional camera, but in a perfect size to carry on everywhere,

Reviews.Title: Great Cam Value for money.
Reviews.Author: Rahul Chatterjee
Reviews.Content: The whole brochure is little complicated, but you can snap very picture with it. Zoom is awesome. Excited have this

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: MaryAnn
Reviews.Content: I already had a powershot camera is why I wanted to get another one, this one is great, small, lightweight and powerful.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, light, and easy to use with an amazing lens for the money.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Only downside is the lack of a view finder.  Hard to keep it still and target accurately when the lens is fully extended whilst looking onto the screen.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Palmdale CA
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. The accesory package was amazing, it has everything you need and more. This camera came with a great price and delivery was very fast.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Kathy Russell
Reviews.Content: I have bought this camera for my granddaughter for a Christmas present.I had already purchased when she told me this was the camera she wants.Thank Goodness.Had an issue with shipping and seller was very prompt about fixing the problemI will buy from them again!!

Reviews.Title: hmmm impressive
Reviews.Author: C. Campbell "one love"
Reviews.Content: i really love this camara easy to use and it gives the look and feel of a big professional expensive camera but also is small enough to feel comfortable to carry it around without it being in the way takes great pics and records great video pretty nice for the average person who just want to take nice quick pics check out my youtube review [...]

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: Marilyn K. Chandler
Reviews.Content: Love the camera.. was a little hesitant from the reviews about the case but apparently they've changed the case they include in the 'kit' because the case if a good size and well worth it...  I am a bit unhappy about the battery life so I've ordered a backup...

Reviews.Title: Cheap but great
Reviews.Author: Bruno Piochi
Reviews.Content: The camera is perfect for its purpose. I recomend for people who wants a good câmera for a low price.

Reviews.Title: Got camera by Christmas eve as promised
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Every thing in box and seems to work great.  THANKS!!  Hope to find more time to use and learn soon.

Reviews.Title: Camera case the wrong size
Reviews.Author: Myron Yura
Reviews.Content: You sent me the wrong camera case with this order.  The case you sent was for a small point and shoot camera.  I am very disappointed with Focus Camera.  I don't need the trouble during the holiday season of packing up the entire order just to get this problem corrected.  I should be able o return just the case and have you send me a new one.  There is no good business reason for you to want me to send back the entire order just for this one problem.

Reviews.Title: Looks like this camera is worth every penney of the price to me.
Reviews.Author: Lynda Eriksen
Reviews.Content: Looks like a beautiful camera.  Unfortunately will have to return it because the camera is too big for what my Grandson wants.

Reviews.Title: Would have ordered the camera
Reviews.Author: Keith Morris
Reviews.Content: I would have ordered the camera but with numerous reviews commenting on a bag that is too small I chose not to.

ProductInfo.Features:
High lens technology in a compact body
Optical Steady Shot image stabilization
ProductInfo.Name: Canon Powershot SX510 HS CMOS 12.1MP w/ 30x Optical Zoom Digital Camera + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
